section.title: Details
section.p: After calling this method, you can listen for the corresponding events in the object and obtain data through . Depending on your project needs, you can add multiple listeners for the same event.

plentry.pd: The name of the target event to listen for. See .

The callback function for eventType. Take adding a listener for as an example:const onPlaybackAudioFrameBeforeMixing = (channelId: string, uid: number, audioFrame: AudioFrame) => {}; engine.addListener('onPlaybackAudioFrameBeforeMixing', onPlaybackAudioFrameBeforeMixing);
